description: Verifiable Memory for AI Agents — knowledge graph, FTS, Starknet proofs, local or cloud

lifecycle.reason: Missing required package metadata (runtimeHint or identifier)

name: io.github.seritalien/brain-protocol

environmentVariables.description: Cloud mode API URL (e.g., https://brain.api.vauban.tech). When unset, uses local SQLite.
environmentVariables.name: BRAIN_API_URL

environmentVariables.description: API key for cloud mode authentication (sent as X-API-Key header)
environmentVariables.name: BRAIN_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: Override path for the local SQLite database file
environmentVariables.name: BRAIN_DB_PATH
